ModMetaData.name: Apitecture Plus!
ModMetaData.author: Lennoxicon
ModMetaData.description:
Fanmade content add-on for the Apini race, featuring new weapons, buildings, and other assorted things! WIP, more content coming soon!
\n\nCredit for the creation of Apini goes to Sera/Miss Bones, and to Jack7D1 and the community for continuing the mod for us to enjoy!
